page.title: 12Recipes.
page.content:
One delicious steamed pudding is a { {Clootie Dumpling}which is made with Flour,Raisins,Sultanas and mixed spices.When the ingredients are mixed together with milk the dumpling is placed in the middle of a scalded linen cloth ,sprinkled with flour,tied tightly with string and boiled for 4 hours in a large pot of boiling water. This has to be tasted to appreciate the full enjoyment the family get from it. {Stovies.} 1\ lbs potatoes, peeled and sliced. 1 large onion chopped 2ozs.Dripping 4ozs of left over meat 1 tsp gravy browning.
Melt dripping, soften onions. Add potato slices and gravy browning. Simmer very slowly for 45 mins. Add meat and heat again for 5 mins.
